resources.string:
Hi, my name is Cillian 

I am 23 years old. 

I have just completed a MSc in Professional Software Development 
I also have a Law Degree. 
I am from County Down in Ireland. 
I am an only child. 

Some hobbies of mine include: 

Football 

Swimming 

Basketball 

Reading 

Playing Chess 

Programming 

Running 

Going to the cinema 

Going out with friends
